nodes.text: Koep was a Zabrak male sergeant in the Republic Army who was stationed in the High Security Section of Belsavis prison, a Galactic Republic penal colony on the planet Belsavis, during the invasion of Belsavis by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War.
Sergeant Koep appears as a Classic Gear Vendor for Republic players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
